description: Offering Memorandums and Rent Rolls - A set of real estate investment documents that provide financial and operational details about a property. The Offering Memorandum typically includes property descriptions, financial performance, market analysis, lease terms, and risk factors, with the first page containing an executive summary and the last page including disclaimers or legal notices. The Rent Roll lists tenant details, lease terms, rental amounts, and occupancy data, often beginning with a summary of rental revenue and ending with lease expiration details or outstanding balances
